General.Name: Indiabulls Real Estate Limited
General.Description: Indiabulls Real Estate Limited operates as a real estate company in India. The company offers real estate properties advisory, properties marketing, maintenance of completed properties, engineering, industrial and technical consultancy, construction and development of real estate properties and other ancillary services. Its project portfolio includes residential and commercial, as well as SEZ projects. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Mumbai, India.
